context: In April 2015, Roper Industries, Inc. changed its name to Roper Technologies, Inc., reflecting the company's evolution and increasing focus on technology-enabled products and software solutions. The company operates through multiple segments including Network Software, Technology Enabled Products, and various application software divisions.
